\n \n

breadcrumb控件

\n

用于带有层次的导航，active状态表明当前页面的位置

\n

如何使用

\n

给父元素添加.u-breadcrumb,自定义导航结构的分隔符

\n

示例

\n

##图标面包屑

\n

"/"为分隔符,并添加Home icon

\n
\n
\n
    \n
  1. Home
    2. \n
  2. Data
    3. \n
\n
    \n
  1. Home
    2. \n
  2. Library
    3. \n
  3. Data
    4. \n
\n
.md-home:before {\n content: "\e6a2";\n font-family: 'uf';\n}
\n
\n
\n<ol class="u-breadcrumb">\n <li><a class="icon md-home u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Home</a></li>\n <li class="active">Data</li>\n</ol>\n<ol class="u-breadcrumb breadcrumb-arrow">\n <li><a class="icon md-home u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Home</a></li>\n <li><a class="u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Library</a></li>\n <li class="active">Data</li>\n</ol>
\n
\n\n

##">>"为分隔符的面包屑

\n
\n
\n
    \n
  1. Home
    2. \n
  2. Library
    3. \n
\n
    \n
  1. Home
    2. \n
  2. Library
    3. \n
  3. Data
    4. \n
\n
.md-home:before {\n content: "\e6a2";\n font-family: 'uf';\n}
\n
\n
\n<ol class="u-breadcrumb u-breadcrumb-arrow">\n <li><a class="u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Home</a></li>\n <li class="active">Library</li>\n</ol>\n<ol class="u-breadcrumb u-breadcrumb-arrow">\n <li><a class="u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Home</a></li>\n <li><a class="u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Library</a></li>\n <li class="active">Data</li>\n</ol>
\n
\n\n

##默认面包屑

\n

"/"为分隔符

\n
\n
    \n
  1. Home
    2. \n
  2. Library
    3. \n
\n
    \n
  1. Home
    2. \n
  2. Library
    3. \n
  3. Data
    4. \n
\n
\n
\n<ol class="u-breadcrumb">\n <li><a class="u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Home</a></li>\n <li class="active">Library</li>\n</ol>\n<ol class="u-breadcrumb">\n <li><a class="u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Home</a></li>\n <li><a class="u-link" href="javascript:void(0)">Library</a></li>\n <li class="active">Data</li>\n</ol>\n
\n
